params.name: VirtualNetworkPeeringParameters
params.desc: Parameters supplied to the create workspace vNet Peering.

201.desc: Created - Returns information about the workspace vNet peering, including provisioning status.

200.desc: Update succeeded - Returns information about the workspace vNet peering.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.desc: List succeeded. Returns the resulting resource objects in response body.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
